item.title: Plotting in R
item.description: Plotting in R can get fairly completed with a plethora of functions and parameters available to users. Fortunately, there is not too much to learn in order to get started with the basics. This post will cover the basics of three different plot types in R: scatterplots, barplots and histograms. Scatterplots Scatterplots are made in R with the plot function. The only necessary arguments are the x and y coordinates of the points to plot.
